                <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">The ethical hacking course in Bangalore goes in-depth into the techniques used by Black Hat hackers and demonstrates it live in a lab-based 100% practically oriented class.</span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8"></span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">Ethical Hacking training in Bangalore&nbsp;provides Certified Ethical Hacking Professional certification or CEHP which enables us to analyze as well as understand computer security procedures through which corporate firms can be protected from any malicious data breaches.&nbsp;Indian Cyber Security Solutions Ethical Hacking Course in Bangalore&nbsp;you get the certification that examines how much a student can use tools of penetration system so as to test systems in computer and security network and implement the same for ethical hacking.</span>

                <div class="brz-accordion__item">
                  <div class="brz-accordion__nav" data-collapsible="on">
                    <span class="brz-span brz-text__editor">How much does it cost to become a Certified Ethical Hacker in Bangalore?</span>
                  </div>

                          <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                            <span class="brz-cp-color8">Ethical Hacking Course in Bangalore by one of the best ethical hacking training institute in Bangalore, Indian Cyber Security Solutions is INR 15000 only (Certified Ethical Hacking Professional  CEHP). This ethical hacking training course is available both online and in classroom training mode.</span>

                <div class="brz-accordion__item">
                  <div class="brz-accordion__nav" data-collapsible="on">
                    <span class="brz-span brz-text__editor">What is the salary of Ethical Hacker in Bangalore?</span>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-accordion__content brz-d-xs-flex brz-flex-xs-column">
                    <div class="brz-accordion__item-content brz-d-xs-flex brz-flex-xs-column">
                      <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                        <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="utazryqnofeymlryjbdjbyiaabbynyjsbymj">
                          <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                            <span class="brz-cp-color8">The salary of an ethical hacker in Bangalore can vary depending on factors like experience, certifications and the organization they are working for. But it is important to note that following ethical hacking training in Bangalore can significantly increase your earnings in this field. With growing concerns about cybersecurity, ethical hackers are in high demand. Organizations across industries are increasingly investing in cyber security measures to protect their valuable data and systems. This has led to an increase in the demand for skilled people who can anticipate vulnerabilities and secure systems.</span>
                          </p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                        <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="lyhpetovnhyntyuqnvbrlwcmzztvlsnqdbkr">
                          <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                            <span class="brz-cp-color8">With proper hacking ethics training in Bangalore, employees can expect competitive salaries. Entry level ethical hackers in Bangalore can earn a salary of 4 to 6 lakhs per year. As they gain experience and expertise, this number can rise exponentially, with middle-class earning around Rs 8 to 12 lakh a year Sea ethical senior hackers with a few years of experience and additional credentials can command a salary increasing, in the range of Rs 15 to 30 million or more per annum Additionally, ethical hackers who constantly update their skills and keep up to date with the latest trends and techniques through ethical hacking training in Bangalore can gain career advantage as Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH), Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), or Certifications such as Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP) can also contribute to higher salaries Notably, salary levels can vary depending on the organization, the job, and the individual discussion. But ethical hacking training in Bangalore gives you the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in this field and increase your chances of earning competitive salaries in the growing cybersecurity sector is a great deal. </span>
                          </p>

                <p class="brz-tp-paragraph">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">The prime objective of this course is to make you ready for the industry where you can use your skills to protect the organization. After completion of this course, you will be able to successfully document the Vulnerability Assessment report for the organization.</span>
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>

              <div class="brz-spacer brz-css-ohqwu"></div>

                            <p class="brz-text-lg-center brz-fs-xs-im-19 brz-fs-sm-im-19 brz-fs-lg-20 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-lg-400 brz-ft-google brz-ff-overpass brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-lh-xs-im-1_6 brz-lh-sm-im-1_6 brz-lh-lg-1_9">
                              <strong class="brz-cp-color3">Technical Educational Background</strong>

                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">If you had completed your graduation in science (B. Tech in CSE/IT/EC or BCA) you will need to start with&nbsp;</span>
                              <a href="https://indiancybersecuritysolutions.com/python-training-in-bangalore/" target="_blank" style class="link--external brz-cp-color8" data-brz-link-type="external">Certified Python Programmer</a>
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">&nbsp;to have a good base of programming and where you can develop hacking tools using it. After completion of python programming certification, you will be eligible for this ethical hacking course and then complete it with&nbsp;</span>
                              <a href="https://indiancybersecuritysolutions.com/web-penetration-testing-training-in-kolkata/" target="_blank" style class="brz-cp-color8 link--external" data-brz-link-type="external">Certified Web Application Penetration Testing</a>
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">&nbsp;which focuses on actually exploiting vulnerabilities in web-based applications which is in huge demand all around the globe</span>

            <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
              <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="axcnmymyllqgrbnhgkfeknuzdodsmmpnhtcq">
                <p class="brz-text-lg-center brz-lh-lg-1_9 brz-lh-sm-im-1_6 brz-lh-xs-im-1_6 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-fs-lg-29 brz-fs-sm-im-28 brz-mt-xs-27 brz-fs-xs-20 brz-text-xs-left">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color3">Tools that will be covered by Indian Cyber Security Solutions:</span>
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-swgvh brz-wrapper">
              <div class="brz-carousel css-s8b2ei" data-custom-id="vyxrdyqrtjwveqtzpeynjzdbsfbtkcehffab">
                <div class="brz-carousel__slider" data-slides-to-show="3" data-slides-to-scroll="1" data-arrows="true" data-dots="true" data-dots-class="brz-slick-slider__dots brz-slick-slider__dots--circle" data-auto-play="false" data-auto-play-speed="3000" data-swipe="true" data-responsive="%5B%7B%22breakpoint%22%3A991%2C%22settings%22%3A%7B%22slidesToShow%22%3A2%2C%22slidesToScroll%22%3A1%7D%7D%2C%7B%22breakpoint%22%3A767%2C%22settings%22%3A%7B%22slidesToShow%22%3A1%2C%22slidesToScroll%22%3A1%7D%7D%5D">
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="ikzpzslojaimjbohfxguhuepxyxurvaulvep">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-anbdu brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-gltdo">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-wvwyd" data-custom-id="orzrcfxtdtjowulvnjwjmgvevbmfklyhofux">
                             
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute"  src="img/thc hydra.png" alt="Ethical Hacking Training in Bangalore" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="zkeajsifdurgbljsqovhokunnwiotqbedyfo">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">THC-Hydra: THC-Hydra is a popular password-cracking tool used by ethical hackers to perform malicious attacks on login pages and network services. It supports various protocols including FTP, SSH, Telnet, HTTP, and many others. The tool uses a dictionary attack method, where it tries multiple passwords from a list until it finds the right one. Its simplicity, speed, and ease of use make it a valuable tool for ethical hackers in testing the security of systems.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="mnirbvtrgqhphtkvfeobmryoxptauewsssgg">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-phtyn brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-rcsfb">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-corom" data-custom-id="ykgnmuepylmphgfyvkbrlgerlnhuwrxxmako">
                              
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" src="img/wireshark.webp" alt="Ethical Hacking Training in Bangalore" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="rqbcyerbijlkszkzxkefjpizooanomoatmsg">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">WireShark: Wireshark is a widely used network protocol analyzer that captures and displays network traffic in real time. It is commonly used in ethical hacking to analyze network vulnerabilities and detect malicious activity.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="ohladylismybedztcituvirylecykfetomfo">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-uiktc brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-ddtjw">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-tmaax" data-custom-id="uelzbgwyoyrgovyfcltpiietnlzxblejkoss">
                             
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" src="img/sql ninja.webp" alt="Ethical Hacking Training in Bangalore" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="bmrnlzqahordyjznoladxvsfgsfrksykaocn">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">SQL Ninja: SQL Ninja is an open source tool used in ethical hacking to exploit SQL injection vulnerabilities in a database. It helps in the process of finding and exploiting SQL injection flaws to gain access to sensitive data.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="lcfzihaiwwpxbsgkwnhixeoidmedzuutjxtl">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-melsb brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-cylvt">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-phyxq" data-custom-id="msboejjrvuqftomzamwebqgkpuxkgnfsacms">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/7b922957cbf0cac8a5db15e4e50967af.png" alt="tools images7" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="nfknksaymnoyugjxefqcdfakspdrcankvpgm">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">Aircrack NG: Aircrack-ng is a popular open source tool used by ethical hackers for network auditing and penetration testing. It allows users to monitor wireless network security by analyzing packet capture files and performing various attacks such as deauthentication, WEP/WPA cracking, and brute-force dictionary attacks. With its powerful features and flexibility, Aircrack- ng is an essential tool for anyone interested in ethical hacking and network security.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="mantxwgtahexourkdbnzbqlzgjtopoldvlgj">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-vuzru brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-dnbae">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-kvklm" data-custom-id="mhjygxucharedcpvvrkexcmkxyxrwjkrswup">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/50cbf7b5d329eafbeb9f1acc8cce90eb.png" alt="tools images8" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="lqvoxqdbkvlncoifgdyjissnlccauhacbijb">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">NMAP Project: Nmap, short for "Network Mapper," is a powerful open-source tool used by ethical hackers to scan networks and discover hosts and services. It can be used for analysis, vulnerability analysis, and penetration testing. Nmap can identify hosts and their associated services, operating systems, and applications running on them. It also has various advanced features such as OS fingerprinting, version detection, and scripting for automating tasks.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="jiqhnnsswihkoilmabrulsidpmbubeitpslj">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-rxuuh brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-djvkg">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-yktdz" data-custom-id="kbxtavymlpvpfjchhhnexiwoykxjlkrongkr">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/9386129495e3f1432f72c7e31d429f3c.png" alt="tools images9" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="wotljlecgwabtrzswrrsllbngwvieaqgfpru">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">OWASP: OWASP is an online community of resources and tools to help organizations and developers create secure software. Production tools include OWASP Top 10, a list of the most common web application security threats, and OWASP ZAP, a vulnerability scanner.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="krnqmfrxmczviajrivinixlzrivoifvzlsws">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-auiog brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-eglbs">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-nkyzm" data-custom-id="poshpshlyderzbrvjzruimihclxkpsrdxcmb">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/450c2650ec2131f39ae524eabf77a2b6.png" alt="tools images10" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="riwvrwuqdtzqemzzrjftqjjdxylgtqrffsxa">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">Metasploit: Metasploit is a powerful and widely-used penetration testing framework that helps security professionals identify vulnerabilities in computer systems and networks. It provides a range of tools and exploits to simulate real-world attacks, allowing testers to assess the security posture of their target systems. Metasploit enables efficient vulnerability scanning, automated exploitation, and post-exploitation activities.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="yjvhrtnbvhkajxpoodckxdgjujmezqwpziin">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-ihqbv brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-yftpa">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-zluvq" data-custom-id="vmuzpfjeuqulgqabsyhovwambyyxkwwggxda">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/79a308cc09f65dcc9e2ef2234a51e432.png" alt="tools images11" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="tdkknowpkzfsjqobuldoysgrhcmcxnnjsxhe">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">John the Ripper: John the Ripper is a popular password cracking tool used in ethical hacking to test the strength of passwords. It uses dictionary attacks and brute force attacks to crack passwords. John the Ripper can be used to identify weak passwords and is widely used by security professionals to weaknesses in password security.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="zsahmdrziskbluyxfikrfesqaaeffyuumzpp">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-bziee brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-bdcnm">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-lnchv" data-custom-id="ovaujelchdkqtvfxdtyuixbmqynwljhxkxku">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/a4fe970ac02b81f719276f5b577e1069.png" alt="tools images12" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="sqcasjesnfhzrqljuzjhkategfzlqotyvenl">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">Backtrack: BackTrack is a Linux-based penetration testing tool that is used by ethical hackers to perform security testing on networks and applications. It includes a wide range of powerful security testing tools and provides an efficient and effective way to identify security vulnerabilities and assess overall network security. It has since been succeeded by Kali Linux.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="jboxicmnzsletwpabrdgaynidiglwtvrcinj">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-scgkl brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-boctc">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-lhadp" data-custom-id="rwbadqoeeuxalqjddyhpijdjqyoqcvxmpvwm">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/753b6d8b5c20ab192e85fa64bb8bf29e.png" alt="tools image" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-wyehr brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="ycwpyixvxzalmrietfckskjobpybgqdmuktr">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">Bettercap: Bettercap is an open, powerful, and flexible tool used in ethical hacking for network analysis, password sniffing, and man-in-the-middle attacks. It enables security professionals to identify network vulnerabilities, monitor and manipulate network traffic, and perform a variety of other security testing applications. Bettercap can be used for both wired and wireless networks and supports several popular network interfaces. </span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="klojaczwuhulzdqqtkpenfgmizviyiyccyzi">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-obtbo brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-tekwv">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-tisdt" data-custom-id="wqlibsthzbkksqtmnvatiudhlcerxsfdevmb">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/2818ee756942e6fc2051d7e9050af236.png" alt="tools images2" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="mgapxwbipwdxjdblgcfgxmsiiuuflmuxxvhl">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">SQL Map: SQLMap is a widely used and highly effective penetration testing tool designed for identifying and exploiting SQL injection vulnerabilities in web applications. It simplifies the process by automating various tasks, such as detecting the presence of SQL injection, enumerating databases, extracting data, and even providing options for privilege escalation.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="brz-carousel__item">
                    <div class="brz-columns brz-css-wmwnl brz-css-qkemo" data-custom-id="fvuuqdtzcoptjcywesrrdrzmeuxahqtjcnpq">
                      <div class="brz-column__items brz-css-jwndv">
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-css-huihp brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-image brz-css-ebmzi">
                            <picture class="brz-picture brz-d-block brz-p-relative brz-css-ohddf" data-custom-id="gwqaveizhittcxfqorxcqmorrswnkqsmrotu">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=626&amp;iH=626&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=78&amp;cW=626&amp;cH=470/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png 2x" media="(min-width: 992px)">
                              <source srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=354&amp;iH=354&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=44&amp;cW=354&amp;cH=266/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=708&amp;iH=708&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=88&amp;cW=708&amp;cH=532/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px)">
                              <img class="brz-img brz-p-absolute" srcset="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=410&amp;iH=410&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=51&amp;cW=410&amp;cH=308/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png 1x, https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=820&amp;iH=820&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=102&amp;cW=820&amp;cH=616/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png 2x" src="https://a-cloud.b-cdn.net/media/iW=313&amp;iH=313&amp;oX=0&amp;oY=39&amp;cW=313&amp;cH=235/3ddeb728b91a7ea7d516fa6bba38dd60.png" alt="tools images3" draggable="false" loading="lazy">
                            </picture>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
                          <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="behfvdwqtmbzfpcxygoaztlruwafiqojstyk">
                            <p class="brz-tp-paragraph brz-text-lg-justify">
                              <span class="brz-cp-color8">W3af: W3AF is an open source web application security scanner tool used in ethical hacking. It helps to identify weaknesses in a web application by running tests on it. It can detect flaws such as cross-site scripting, SQL injection, and file attachments, among others. It supports both manual and automated testing and provides comprehensive reporting on identified vulnerabilities. It is highly extensible and can be combined with other tools to improve its functionality.</span>
                            </p>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <svg id="nc_icon" viewbox="0 0 16 16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="brz-icon-svg brz-hidden" data-type="editor" data-name="right-arrow-thin">

                      <title>thin</title>
                      <path d="M5.025 16L4 15.009 11.25 8 4 .991 5.025 0l7.762 7.504a.684.684 0 0 1 0 .992L5.025 16z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="none" stroke-width="1" />
                    </g>
                  </svg>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

        <div class="brz-section__content brz-section--boxed brz-css-pdmky brz-css-fgwtz" data-custom-id="nmdubvvuugfptsgiaocwywqytfrjxezbixqo">

            <div class="brz-bg-color"></div>
          </div>
          <div class="brz-container brz-css-ewcsr">
            <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
              <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="bcslndvrzwptkjiywvoiicgjwyudncwikhnx">
                <p class="brz-lh-lg-1_8 brz-lh-sm-im-1_5 brz-lh-xs-im-1_5 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-fs-lg-24 brz-fs-sm-im-24 brz-fs-xs-im-23">
                  <strong class="brz-cp-color8">Trainers Profile </strong>
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="brz-css-xcger brz-wrapper">
              <div class="brz-rich-text brz-css-udzjj" data-custom-id="oasagildcthuxffskjvfhqhttwupxzzgfvwx">
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- Indian Cyber Security Solutions (ICSS) trainers emphasize blended learning. </span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- Trainers at ICSS utilize real-life projects and case studies to provide practical knowledge of Ethical Hacking and Hackers. </span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- ICSS Ethical Hacking trainers in Bangalore have 12+ years of experience in the Networking field. </span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- Trainers at ICSS are working professionals from the cybersecurity field. </span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- ICSS trainers provide corporate training to enrich students' knowledge and industry-relevant skills. </span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- Regular assessments and individual attention are given to students for their progress. </span>
                </p>
                <p class="brz-text-xs-left brz-lh-lg-3_1 brz-bcp-color8 brz-lh-sm-im-2_8 brz-lh-xs-im-2_8 brz-fs-lg-19 brz-fs-sm-im-18 brz-ls-lg-0 brz-ls-sm-im-0 brz-ls-xs-im-0 brz-ff-overpass brz-ft-google brz-fw-lg-400 brz-fw-sm-im-400 brz-fw-xs-im-400 brz-text-lg-justify brz-fs-xs-14">
                  <span class="brz-cp-color8">- ICSS Ethical Hacking trainers assist students in resume building and develop their interpersonal skills.</span>
